A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Excellent continuation of the Star Wars legacy.  I've been a fan since the original in 1977.  The Last Jedi is probably the most challenging (and perhaps rewarding) film in the series in that it challenges some of the tropes that have made the Star Wars universe somewhat predictable.  At the same time Director Rian Johnson adheres to the central themes that made the movies exciting and inspirational in the first place.
